trends: There have been 17 other sightings in Greenwood
There were no other sightings in Greenwood on or around November 21st 2008
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsmy fianc���e and i(i had just proposed, haha) were leaving indianapolis and on our way back to bloomington where she resides. we took bluff road out of indianapolis to state road 37. driving down south, past the greenwood region, but way before ever reaching martinsville, i see an aircraft in the distance, with a solitary flashing light, which flashes once every second or two, moving slowly from south towards the north, rearing up to pass me overhead. i'm not paying too much attention to it, i was too focused on driving, but my lady told me, "check out that plane." at which point, i look up through my windshield, as it's about ten seconds before it could pass overhead of my car. i realize how low it is, it's only 50-100 feet(i'm terrible at estimating lengths) above us, this scares me, as i believe it's a dangerously low flying plane. when i look up however, and when the light flashed, i caught my first glimpse of the object. i said out loud, "that's not an airplane." second flash of light, i can distinctly make out the shape, that of which i have never seen in my life, and i come from a family with a history in aviation. it was like a skeleton, just composed of bars\supports, possibly metallic, and it was two times, possibly three times, larger than my car. the light flashed from the center of the object, and i could not see anything except for the supports\bars that composed the structure, no i'm not sure where anyone could possibly pilot the object from. it was silent, it didn't interrupt my radio signal, it flew right overhead, and there were many people on the state road who could of, but probably did not take any notice of the object at all. i kept driving, because there was nothing i could have been able to do, i had left my camera in bloomington. (oh was i furious. haha.) my lady and i just kept talking about how strange the aircraft was, and she kept watching it as i kept driving, she said it eventually stopped moving north, and started moving straight up into the night sky. she lost sight of the beast as the drive continued. she was convinced it was some kind of ultralight aircraft, but it was so much larger, and there was nothing attached to the structure, like a glider or anything. originally i thought the object was triangular or pyramidal shaped, but it was so large and i only got to see the front half of it, so there could be much more to the back end than i realized. when i came home, i told my father all about this aircraft, and he could not think of a similar object he's ever seen in the air. so i did some research of my own, and the only thing i can come up with that is similar looking, strikingly similar, but i believe a bit larger, is the lunar landing research vehicle. i believe that's what it's called, but for your sake i will attach a picture to this report, so nobody has to go out google searching.
Summary: Close contact with low flying UFO.
